item.description:
Creation Entertainment is bringing their Star Trek cavalcade to Boston June 8th and 9th, 2013. Currently slated to appear are William Shatner, George Takei, Nichelle Nichols (YES!), Brent Spiner, Jonathan Frakes, and more.

There are several different ticket packages available. If you avail yourself of the top of the line Gold Weekend Package, you will get a reserved seat in the main hall, an autograph from William Shatner, George Takei, and Nichelle Nichols, and first shot at getting autographs from the others. Try to select a seat around or near F50 and F51. That's where Caitlin and I will be.

As the date draws near, we can plan for more fun and hanging out. Maybe an after-party?

http://www.creationent.com/cal/stma.htm
item.name: Boston Star Trek Convention June 2013
